overview: The film is based on one of the forty-four small pieces that make up the book, in particular: "They are going back many years now and still today I have remorse. There was no reason to stop coming to my house two masked crashers, always the same two coffins, with the same things, with the same gods. They knew a secret of my girlfriend's love and every year I saw you vineyards in the face with the same words, with the same laughter of paifocas ... "
title: The tragedy of Xirobio
